student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! Did you know the Eiffel Tower is in Paris, France? It’s very famous and really tall—over 300 meters!
Yes, I knowed that. It very tall!
Great! Did you also know it was built in 1889? It was made for a big fair called the World’s Fair. People love to visit it and take pictures!
Wow, I not know that! 1889 is long time ago.
Yes, it’s very old! Over 130 years! The Eiffel Tower was only supposed to stay for 20 years, but people liked it so much, they kept it. Now it’s one of the most famous places in the world!
That's interesting! I happy they keep it. Do you visit it?

I haven’t visited it, but I’d love to one day! You can go up the tower and see all of Paris from the top. It’s a must-see if you ever go to France! Thanks for chatting about the Eiffel Tower with me—it was fun!
You’re welcome! I hope to see it someday. Paris sounds amazing!
Good job! You have completed the task. I hope you get to visit Paris and the Eiffel Tower one day—it’s truly amazing! Talk to you later!
